article:
One day, several young people went for a picnic. They walked in the open air with _ 
As soon as they came to a river, they were attracted by the clear and calm water. They played with cool       water excitedly. Suddenly, a lovely _ passed by Tom. He tried to catch it, _ the fish was just      swimming a few feet ahead of him. He ran _ it, hoping to catch it.
Gradually, Tom came to the water with waist deep. He felt _ so he wanted to jump out of the water. _ up and down in the water, he went farther and farther away from the bank. Just at that time, Barry saw this, he offered _ help to Tom at once. Tom saw someone swimming to him, he caught the person _ was close to him. Unfortunately, Barry was dragged into the water. The two struggled in the water _ .  Amy, on the bank, noticed that, and she turned to others near the bank.
Hearing their cries, two farmers near the river took a long rope there. They threw one end of the rope to _ of them in the water. Together, all the people on the bank pulled the other end.
Finally, the two boys were saved !
The experience has told us _ we should do something to help others correctly.
